Question.Subject: How to download the internet?
Question.ChosenAnswer:
As you have a small cap if you download this small free program.
It’s only 1.15 MB ►
http://www.hootech.com/NetMeter
You can set it with your cap. It will show a running display of your usage [all up and downloads] and keep running logs on a daily, weekly and monthly basis. It will also, work out daily what you have left for the rest of the month and how much you can use each day. It will also warn you when you are approaching that limit.
It will also give some idea how fast your using your limit.
Have a look at Screen Shots in the left hand column on the Home Page and you will see how it works.

Answer.Content:
I think you would need a bit more than 100GB to download the internet, more like a few PBs. If you don't know what a PB is then perhaps you're not as tech-savvy as you thought you were.
EDIT: I didn't mention USB anywhere in my original answer, and USB is irrelevant anyway as no existing USB device could store the internet.
Let's look at your question a bit closer - you want to find a website, which resides on the internet, from which you can download the internet. So once you find this website, which I remind you is ON the internet, you want to download the internet, but as that website must also be a part of the internet you intend to download it too, thus you enter an infinite loop requiring an infinite amount of space as you download the internet from a website which must include the internet (or a link to download it) ad infinitum.

As you have a small cap if you download this small free program.
It’s only 1.15 MB ►
http://www.hootech.com/NetMeter
You can set it with your cap. It will show a running display of your usage [all up and downloads] and keep running logs on a daily, weekly and monthly basis. It will also, work out daily what you have left for the rest of the month and how much you can use each day. It will also warn you when you are approaching that limit.
It will also give some idea how fast your using your limit.
Have a look at Screen Shots in the left hand column on the Home Page and you will see how it works.

Download the internet? No offence but do you have any idea at all on how the internet works, what it's made up of. There are Millions of terabytes of information floating around the world wide web. Millions of sites hosted on millions of servers and you want to save it all on two, 500mb usb sticks. Let me just inform you that there is no answer to this question except you're are uninformed and crazy. Please think about this for a second before you start giving people hell for not teaching you how to do the impossible. You've made a farcical request and proved beyond a doubt that you are NOT tech savvy. Far from it in fact.
